alert.note: Alert for Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 6:12PM EST until January 28 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 1 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Oswego county. Greatest accumulations expected over the northern portion of the county and close to Lake Ontario. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 1 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times with snow covered roads and poor visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Lake effect snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
